column2: Title
Setup Environment
column14:
Create the environment for team members to collaborate and work on source code. Also create the base environment and server for the online platform via Django.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
        - Team Members have access to a Bitbucket Repo.
        - Base Server can be run and accessed by all team members.

column2: As a User, I want to login to the platform so that I can post a submission.
column14:
Create a login page that allows Users to access their accounts. This will enable regular users to perform further actions such as creating and voting on posts.

**Acceptance Criteria**
* The user login page is accessible and functioning
column19: What tasks did your team complete to finish this story? What is your acceptance criteria? (Salim Twalib - Mar 19, 2016)

column2: As an Admin, I want to access an Admin platform so that I can perform administrative actions.
column14:
User Interface platform for the site Administrators to access and utilize. This will allow superusers to perform administrative actions upon submissions and users.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- An Admin Login page is accessible 
- Admins have to login to access this page
column19: Is this feature similar to user login? Please add more information in the description. (Salim Twalib - Mar 19, 2016)

column2: As a User, I want to create an account so that I can use the platform.
column14:
Create a user registration page to allow visitors to sign up for an account.

** Acceptance Criteria **
* Account Registration page is accessible
* User account details are stored correctly

column2: As a User, I want to logout of my account so that nobody can access my account.
column14:
Create a logout page and a link for logged in users to select.

** Acceptance Criteria **
* Logout page successfully logs out the current user
* Users can access the logout page
column22: Create option to logout from website

column2: As a User, I want to be able to change my password so I can keep my account secure.
column14:
Create the functionality of a password modification form that will allow users to change their passwords.

** Acceptance Criteria **
* Password change form is accessible to users
* Form functions correctly and updates stored user password

column2: As an Admin, I want to create user profiles so that users can use my site effectively.
column14:
Create a user creation page that admins can access to create new users.

** Acceptance Criteria **
* Page is accessible to admins
* Submitted forms will create new user accounts

column2: Host project online
column14:
The site is now accessible by the following links:

http://cbeardsmore.pythonanywhere.com
http://bit.ly/curtinideas

column2: As a User, I want to view existing submissions so that I can see all past submissions posted.
As an Admin, I want to edit submissions so that I can remove offensive language.
column14: This ability for admins to edit the Submissions database is pre-built into the Django Admin platform. As a result, only minor modifications and testing was required to finish this user story.

column22: Create page to accept submission criteria
column24: Have database update with input fields and default values

column2: As an Admin, I want to remove submissions so that I can remove inappropriate submissions.
column14: This ability for admins to edit the Submissions database is pre-built into the Django Admin platform. As a result, only minor modifications and testing was required to finish this user story.

column2: As a User, I want to delete my improvement so that I can remove my improvement.
As a User, I want to edit my improvement so that I can fix spelling errors.
As a User, I want to delete my comment so that I can remove my comment.
As a User, I want to edit my comments so that I can fix spelling errors.
As a User, I want to suggest improvements to a submission so that I can improve on an idea.
As a User, I want to comment on a submission so that I can voice my support of the idea.

As a User, I want to down-vote on submissions so that I can acknowledge submissions I dislike.

column2: As a User, I want to see the total votes for a submission so that I can see how popular it is.
As a User, I want to sort submissions based on date so that I can see the newest submissions.
As a User, I want to sort submissions based on popularity so I can see the most popular submissions.
As a User, I want to sort submissions based on views so that I can see the most popular submissions.
As a User, I want to categorise my submission so that other users can find it easily.

column2: As a User, I want to view submissions based on category so that I can view relevant submissions.
As an admin I want to be able to delete comments because they may contain inappropriate material.
As an admin I want to edit comments because they may contain bad language.
As an AdminI want to delete improvements so that I can remove inappropriate improvements
As an admin I want to be able to edit improvements because they may contain bad language.
As a User, I want other users to see my level when I post so that I can show my level off when posting.
As a User, I want to gain levels based on my points so that I am rewarded for utilizing the platform.
column20: Discuss how many points per level

column2: As a User, I want to gain points when my submission receives votes so I am rewarded for good work.
As a User, I want to gain points for posting improvements so that I am encouraged to post again.
As a User, I want to gain points for posting submissions so that I am encouraged to post again.
As an Admin, I want an Admin Tag so that other Users see my account as an Admin.
As a User, I want to gain points for voting on submissions so that I am encouraged to vote again.
As a User, I want to up-vote on improvements so that I can support improvements I like.
As a User, I want to only vote once for a submission so that voting is fair and equal for all users.
As a User, I want to un-vote on submissions so that I can change my mind on voting.
As a User, I want to down-vote on improvements so that I can support improvements I like.
As a User, I want to add images to my submission so that I can add relevant images to my submission.
column19: Didn't end up embedding images. Decided to enable the user to add a link to a separate image hosting service. (Brendan Lally - Apr 23, 2016)

column2: As a User, I want to add videos to my submission so that I can add relevant videos to my submission.
column19: Didn't end up embedding videos. Decided to enable the user to add a link to a separate video hosting service. (Brendan Lally - Apr 23, 2016)
